context: Consolidation in storage market. In 2009, NetApp ranked second in market capitalization behind EMC, and ahead of Seagate, Western Digital, Brocade, Imation, and Quantum. NetApp settled patent disputes with Oracle (new owner of Sun) regarding ZFS File System in September 2010. The Big 5 storage vendors were emerging.

competitors.name: EMC Corporation
competitors.notes: Market leader in enterprise storage by revenue and market cap, leading the Big 5

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Third in Big 5 ranking with comprehensive storage portfolio

competitors.name: Hewlett-Packard
competitors.notes: Fourth in Big 5 with HP StorageWorks and 3PAR (acquired 2010)

competitors.name: Hitachi Data Systems
competitors.notes: Fifth in Big 5 with enterprise storage arrays

competitors.name: Dell
competitors.notes: Growing storage business with EqualLogic and Compellent acquisitions

competitors.name: Oracle Corporation
competitors.notes: Storage offerings following Sun Microsystems acquisition, ZFS competitor
